name: Hi
description: Hi, is a platforming game that I made for my final project in college to illustrate what I've learned in terms of 3D game development, I also added some stuff I learned during independent study. In this game you play a sphere trying to traverse the world I've made to reach the WIN objective at the end. Falling will be punished with a restart or return to a checkpoint, clever use of the jetpack function (Ctrl) and jump(spacebar) will separate the great players from the good! Enjoy my game and please feel free to leave feedback.
